thread.title: Ben Carson Says Media 'Manipulated' Black Voters

author: Susie Madrak
title: Ben Carson Says Media 'Manipulated' Black Voters
text:
posted on Bernie Sanders: I Wouldn't Be As Naive As Obama Chunga • 1 min ago 
Had to suffer through him as the guest speaker at a Chamber of Commerce event I worked some 4 years ago. He says the same exact things today as he did in his pandering speech then. He was bat shit crazy then and he is bat shit crazy today. He is Jiggery Pokery Applesauce nuts. Frank Smith • 1 min ago 
It's such an amazing beautiful plan - so simple it's hard to believe. They have great money because they have much oil so we put boots on the ground, knock 'em out, take their oil and put circles around it. It's really, really fantastic! posted on Donald Trump Has A Nice, Beautiful, Top Secret Plan To Defeat ISIL Latest from CLTV
